title: Plastic Juice Bottles with Caps, ZEONHAK 35 Pack 16 OZ Reusable Clear Bulk Beverage Containers, Food Grade Plastic Juice Bottles with Lids for Juice, Milk and Other Beverages
features: FOOD-GRADE MATERIAL - The plastic juice bottles are made of high-quality food-grade PET plastic, which is environmentally friendly, safe, strong, and BPA-free. Compared with others, our bottles are not easily deformed, and have excellent durability and excellent quality.

LEAK-PROOF DESIGN - Each 16 oz plastic juice bottles comes with a cap to form a good seal, effectively preventing drink leakage and spillage and other troublesome problems. At the same time, they can keep your drinks clean and fresh.

VALUE FOR MONEY - You will get 35 pack empty plastic juice bottles to meet your diverse needs. Their size is 2.3 x 2.3 x 7 inches. The small and slim bottle design makes them have a comfortable touch and good grip, which can be carried wherever you want.

PERFECT PRODUCT - These plastic juice bottles with lids are very suitable for storing fruit juice, milk, milkshakes, coffee, vegetable juice, smoothies, lemonade, seasonings, syrups and more. They are the perfect choice for picnics, sports, restaurants, juice shops and gyms.

100% GUARANTEE - If our plastic juice bottles have any quality problems, you can request a full refund and return within 30 days after receiving the product. Quality and customer satisfaction are our top priorities. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at any time. You have no risk, click Add to Cart!
description: ZEONHAK always regard high-quality products, satisfactory service, customer orientation as the commitment. We try our best to provide durable and premium food-grade plastic juice bottles and related products. If you are looking for economical and practical plastic juice bottles, ZEONHAK is your ideal choice.

● The plastic juice bottles are easy to dispose. Just throw them in the trash can after use. They are environmentally friendly, safe, recyclable, and will not pollute the environment. You can also rinse them off for the next use. ● The 16 oz plastic bottles with caps are strong, durable, wear-resistant, not easily deformed or distorted, with excellent quality and long service life. ● The appearance of the bottle is simple, exquisite and fashionable, and it can perfectly store any beverage you want. ● Our plastic juice bottles come with a leak-proof cap, your drink will not spill or drip, and your drink will remain clean and fresh. ● The clear plastic bottles are very suitable for storing fruit juice, milk, milkshakes, coffee, vegetable juice, smoothies, lemonade, seasonings, syrups and so on.
Material: Premium PET Plastic Size: 2.3 x 2.3 x 7 inches Color: Clear
